abstract: Report by nonprofit Stimson Center says military has managed to modernize much of its equipment through $1 trillion in arms purchases over last decade; report comes at time of growing concern at the Pentagon over impending budget cuts.
snippet: As concerns grow at the Pentagon over likely budget cuts, a new report contends that the military has upgraded equipment through $1 trillion in arms purchases.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: As concerns grow at the Pentagon over likely budget cuts, a new report contends that the military has upgraded equipment through $1 trillion in arms purchases.

headline.main: Military Is Said to Make Progress in Modernizing
headline.print_headline: Military Is Said to Make Progress in Modernizing
headline.seo: Military Is Said to Make Progress in Modernizing
